definition: to cheat/to swindle/to deceive/to get on (a horse etc) by swinging one leg over

sentences.english: I do not personate the stage-play emperor to entrap applause.

definition: to entice/to lure/to scam/to hoodwink/to decoy
to feign/to pretend to be/to pass oneself off as
to gain profit (by underhand means)/to exploit/exploitation
